Develop a submersible vehicle that can withstand extreme pressure and temperatures, equipped with advanced technology for exploring and documenting the ocean floor.
Create a team of experts in marine biology, geology, and engineering to lead the mission and conduct research studies.
Establish partnerships with academic institutions and research organizations to share knowledge and resources.
Build a support infrastructure, including a base of operations and a fleet of support vessels, to ensure the safety and success of the mission.
Develop aelses educational outreach program to engage the public and inspire future generations of ocean explorers and scientists.
